subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
Lockouts
Football (College)
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Von Miller, a linebacker at Texas A&M, had mixed emotions when asked to join the N.F.L. suit, as activist players can be frowned upon as potentially divisive figures.
